summary: Diff adds core PWA assets (manifest, service worker, offline fallback page) and introduces an in-app AppInfo dialog in the main layout to show/copy the app URL and guide installation. However, the URL being copied/displayed appears to be only the origin (not the full current URL), and the required image assets themselves are not shown as added in the diff summary. There is also a notifications panel/toggle added to the layout that is not part of the BuildRequest.

missing_requirements.requirement: UI shows the current app URL (derived from window.location) in a readable, copyable form, and “Copy link” copies the full URL.
missing_requirements.reason: AppInfoDialog uses window.location.origin, which omits the path/query/hash and therefore does not represent the full current URL.

missing_requirements.requirement: Provide the required image assets (logo, header background, icon set, and app icons) as files in the project.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff references image paths under /assets/generated/... in the manifest, service worker cache list, and layout header, but the diff summary does not show any of these image files being added/modified.

hallucinated_features.description: Notification panel UI and toggle in the main app header (Bell icon, NotificationPanel component usage).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not request adding notifications UI; it is unrelated to PWA installability or in-app URL sharing/install help.
